title: murugA inda
sahitya:
murugA inda EzhaiyEniDam iranguvAi manam iranguvAi


anupallavi

  karuNai enakkuDanE kATTiDa vENum varuttam anaittum OTTiDa vENum


caraNam    nondu naliyA varam tArum undan kaDaikkaN tirandenaip-pArum
endaniDam krpai siridEnum kUrum bandhamozhitten paritApam tIrum
 				(madhyamakAla)
santatam undanai endan manadil cintanai sheidE vandanai purivEn
ventuyar tIrAi sendil vaDivEl kandanE vandenai kAttaruL taruvAi
